meanings.definition: A university lecturer who is not on the regular faculty.
meanings.sent1: The privatdocent shared valuable knowledge with the students.
meanings.sent2: The privatdocent was invited to give a guest lecture at the university.
meanings.sent3: The privatdocent's quirky sense of humor made the lecture entertaining.
meanings.sent4: In the sea of professors, the privatdocent's unique teaching style stood out.
meanings.sent5: The students eagerly awaited the privatdocent's next class.

meanings.sent1: She decided to privatdocent at the prestigious university.
meanings.sent2: He will privatdocent in the upcoming academic year.
meanings.sent3: Privatdocenting allowed her to share her expertise with a wider audience.
meanings.sent4: He aimed to privatdocent in multiple universities to gain experience.
meanings.sent5: The opportunity to privatdocent was a dream come true for him.
